alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 20 at 9:21PM EDT until March 25 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, considerable flooding of lowlands occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:05 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:05 PM CDT Sunday was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 17.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall to 17.2 feet and begin rising again Tuesday evening. It will rise to 17.3 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
